scripts.start: for dir in ./node-*; do (cd "$dir" && node server.js &); done
scripts.start-perf: for dir in ./node-*; do (cd "$dir" && node --perf_basic_prof server.js &); done
scripts.docker-build: for dir in node-*; do (cd "$dir" && docker build -t gcr.io/${PROJECT_ID}/$dir:v1 .); done
scripts.push-to-gcloud: for dir in node-*; do (gcloud docker -- push gcr.io/${PROJECT_ID}/$dir); done
scripts.clean: for dir in ./node-*; do (cd "$dir" && rm -rf node_modules && rm *.lock.json); done
scripts.k8-deployments: cd k8s; for dep in *-deployment.yaml; do (kubectl apply -f $dep); done
scripts.k8-services: cd k8s; for serv in *-service.yaml; do (kubectl apply -f $serv); done
scripts.install: cd node-add && npm install && cd ../node-calc && npm install && cd ../node-divide && npm install && cd ../node-multiply && npm install && cd ../node-postfix && npm install && cd ../node-subtract && npm install && cd ../node-power && npm install
